mapper.sql: ID, VERNO_CTX, KEYTYPE, KEYSTATUS, TSTFLAG, REFCODE, KEYSEQNO, KEYVALUE, PREVALUE, CHECKVALUE, ACTDATE, ACTTIME, EXPIRY, LONGKEYVAL
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ENCKEY
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into MERCHANT_X_RECORD (MRCHNO, MRCH_NAME, MODIFY_MODULE, REMOTE_ADDR, REMOTE_MAC, USER_AGENT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, ORIGINAL_RECORD, MODIFY_RECORD) values (#{mrchno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mrchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remoteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remoteMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalRecord,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{modifyRecord,jdbcType=CLOB})

insert into ENCKEY (ID, VERNO_CTX, KEYTYPE, KEYSTATUS, TSTFLAG, REFCODE, KEYSEQNO, KEYVALUE, PREVALUE, CHECKVALUE, ACTDATE, ACTTIME, EXPIRY, LONGKEYVAL) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vernoCtx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{keytype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{keystatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tstflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyseqno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{keyvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prevalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{acttime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expiry,jdbcType=DATE}, #{longkeyval,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ENCKEY
ID,
VERNO_CTX,
KEYTYPE,
KEYSTATUS,
TSTFLAG,
REFCODE,
KEYSEQNO,
KEYVALUE,
PREVALUE,
CHECKVALUE,
ACTDATE,
ACTTIME,
EXPIRY,
LONGKEYVAL,

mapper.update:
update ENCKEY
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VERNO_CTX = #{record.vernoCtx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
KEYTYPE = #{record.keytype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
KEYSTATUS = #{record.keystatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TSTFLAG = #{record.tstflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REFCODE = #{record.refcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEYSEQNO = #{record.keyseqno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
KEYVALUE = #{record.keyvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREVALUE = #{record.prevalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKVALUE = #{record.checkvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTDATE = #{record.actdate,jdbcType=DATE},
ACTTIME = #{record.acttime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPIRY = #{record.expiry,jdbcType=DATE},
LONGKEYVAL = #{record.longkeyval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ENCKEY set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERNO_CTX = #{record.vernoCtx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KEYTYPE = #{record.keytype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KEYSTATUS = #{record.keystatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TSTFLAG = #{record.tstflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFCODE = #{record.refcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYSEQNO = #{record.keyseqno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KEYVALUE = #{record.keyvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREVALUE = #{record.prevalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKVALUE = #{record.checkvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTDATE = #{record.actdate,jdbcType=DATE}, ACTTIME = #{record.acttime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPIRY = #{record.expiry,jdbcType=DATE}, LONGKEYVAL = #{record.longkeyval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ENCKEY
VERNO_CTX = #{vernoCtx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
KEYTYPE = #{keytype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
KEYSTATUS = #{keystatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TSTFLAG = #{tstflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REFCODE = #{refcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEYSEQNO = #{keyseqno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
KEYVALUE = #{keyvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREVALUE = #{prevalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKVALUE = #{checkvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTDATE = #{actdate,jdbcType=DATE},
ACTTIME = #{acttime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPIRY = #{expiry,jdbcType=DATE},
LONGKEYVAL = #{longkeyval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ENCKEY set VERNO_CTX = #{vernoCtx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KEYTYPE = #{keytype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KEYSTATUS = #{keystatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TSTFLAG = #{tstflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFCODE = #{refcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYSEQNO = #{keyseqno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KEYVALUE = #{keyvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREVALUE = #{prevalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKVALUE = #{checkvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTDATE = #{actdate,jdbcType=DATE}, ACTTIME = #{acttime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPIRY = #{expiry,jdbcType=DATE}, LONGKEYVAL = #{longkeyval,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select TO_CHAR(enckey_sequence.nextval) as id from dual
